entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Packaging: Would it be possible to use a custom location for dotnet SDK runtimes and versioned components? #31160
  • Updating to 0.9.0-beta.23127.3 gives stack dump #31168

Closed

  • Pound Sign/Hashtag in Response File Breaks Deployments #30759
  • [Pack] NU1102 errors occur when running command “dotnet pack --runtime win10-x64” #30654
  • Unable to install any dotnet tool #30961
  • Wrong version number under "Installed Apps" #30993
  • Why does AutoGenerateBindingRedirects produce a config file with multiple assemblyBinding elements? #31157
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64]On VS 17.6 preview 3 which carries net 8 preview 2 SDK, running web project failed in CLI. #31114

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup and gen api should not reference internal type attribute argument #31158
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.10.0 to 19.11.1 in /eng/dependabot #31152
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.10.0 to 19.11.1 in /eng/dependabot #31151
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • [Breaking Backport] Restore Console Encoding upon Exit #31077
    Area-CLI
  • [Forward Port] Restore Encoding for the .NET SDK upon Exit #31101
  • Allow hashtag in response files #31167
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31148
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Document for breaking changes, Area-NetSDK
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #31079
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add tests for the operation(install/uninstall/update package) when global settings file is corrupted #30970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30972
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30973
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31135
    Area-Infrastructure
